trans-unit.source: Provides a managed way of dynamically viewing, creating or invoking types supported by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 提供動態檢視、建立或叫用 (Invoke) XML Web Service 所支援類型的 Managed 方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the class or interface to reflect.
trans-unit.target: 要反映的類別或介面的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The address (URL) of the XML Web service.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> including the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the XML Web service at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" />，包括指定 URL 上 XML Web Service 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This method examines the metadata for the XML Web service at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查在指定的 URL 之 XML Web 服務的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Type> is not supported, it modifies the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file corresponding to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> describing the XML Web service, in order to include that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Type>是不受支援，它會修改 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 檔案對應到<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>描述 XML Web 服務，以包含該型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" /> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 XML Web Service 相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> of zero.
Any members must be explicitly added using the collection's <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 任何成員必須明確加入使用集合的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 XML Web Service 相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 與 XML Web Service 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> of zero.
Any members must be explicitly added using the collection's <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 任何成員必須明確加入使用集合的<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。
